dcterms:creator: N. K. Kalantari
R. Ramamoorthi
dcterms:description: The Kalantari17 dataset consists of sequences of images captured with varying exposure settings, specifically designed for training and evaluating HDR imaging methods, particularly in dynamic scenes.
dcterms:title: Kalantari17 Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. R. Prabhakar
R. Arora
A. Swaminathan
K. P. Singh
R. V. Babu
dcterms:description: The Prabhakar19 dataset is designed for evaluating deghosting methods in HDR imaging, containing sequences of images captured with different exposure settings to test the robustness of HDR algorithms.
dcterms:title: Prabhakar19 Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. R. Prabhakar
S. Agrawal
D. Singh
B. Ashwath
R. V. Babu
dcterms:description: The Prabhakar20 dataset is utilized for training and evaluating high-resolution HDR deghosting methods, focusing on practical applications in dynamic scenes.
dcterms:title: Prabhakar20 Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. K. Kalantari
R. Ramamoorthi
dcterms:description: The UCSD dataset is similar to the Kalantari17 dataset and is used for evaluating HDR imaging methods, particularly in dynamic scenes with varying exposures.
dcterms:title: UCSD Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. T. Tursun
A. O. Akyüz
A. Erdem
E. Erdem
dcterms:description: The METU dataset provides a comprehensive evaluation of HDR deghosting methods, containing sequences of images captured under various conditions to test the effectiveness of different algorithms.
dcterms:title: METU Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Karaduzovic-Hadziabdic
T. J. Hasic
R. K. Mantiuk
dcterms:description: The Cambridge dataset consists of multi-exposure image stacks specifically designed for testing HDR deghosting methods, providing a variety of scenes and exposure settings.
dcterms:title: Cambridge Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. T. Tursun
A. O. Akyüz
A. Erdem
E. Erdem
dcterms:description: The Tursun dataset provides an objective quality metric for evaluating HDR images, focusing on the effectiveness of deghosting methods in various scenarios.
dcterms:title: Tursun Dataset
